SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda
Interface CommunicationListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
PrintStreamMonitor, XMLMonitor
public interface CommunicationListener

This is a listener interface for receiving events/notifications about a communication during a simulation.

Method Summary
 void communicationAborted(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked if a communication session is aborted.
 void communicationInitiated(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked when a communication is initiated between two devices.
 void communicationTransmissionFailed(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked if a communication session fails because of a transmission failure.
 void communicationTransmissionSucceeded(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked if a communication session's transmission was successful.
 void discoveryFailed(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked when devices do not manage to successfully discover each other when a discovery attempt is made (and hence the transmission phase is not reached).
 void discoverySucceeded(CommunicationEvent evt)
          Invoked when devices manage to successfully discover each other (and hence proceed to the transmission phase) when a discovery attempt is made.
 

Method Detail

communicationInitiated

void communicationInitiated(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked when a communication is initiated between two devices.

Note that at this stage the artifacts to be transferred between devices have not yet been calculated, so the CommunicationEvent will have null references instead of the lists of artifacts.

discoverySucceeded

void discoverySucceeded(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked when devices manage to successfully discover each other (and hence proceed to the transmission phase) when a discovery attempt is made.

(Counterpart to discoveryFailed.)

See Also:
discoveryFailed(uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.CommunicationEvent)

discoveryFailed

void discoveryFailed(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked when devices do not manage to successfully discover each other when a discovery attempt is made (and hence the transmission phase is not reached).

Note that there will be no artifacts to be transferred to either device, since discovery failed. Hence, in the CommunicationEvent object, both lists of artifacts to be transferred will be null.

(Counterpart to discoverySucceeded.)

See Also:
discoverySucceeded(uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.CommunicationEvent)

communicationAborted

void communicationAborted(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked if a communication session is aborted.

communicationTransmissionSucceeded

void communicationTransmissionSucceeded(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked if a communication session's transmission was successful. Hence, this notification indicates a completely successful communication session (and artifacts will be successfully transferred between the two devices involved).

(Counterpart to communicationTransmissionFailed.)

See Also:
communicationTransmissionFailed(uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.CommunicationEvent)

communicationTransmissionFailed

void communicationTransmissionFailed(CommunicationEvent evt)
Invoked if a communication session fails because of a transmission failure.

(Counterpart to communicationTransmissionSucceeded.)

See Also:
communicationTransmissionSucceeded(uk.ac.cf.cs.scm5mjw.mda.CommunicationEvent)
